about-me: I am Arek. My goal is to become a Junior Front-End Developer. This is my second project made using the React library - I will certainly expand it with new applications soon. If you see the potential in me - please contact me.
weather-app-content: A weather application that uses data from the API.
recipe-app-content: The recipe finder that also uses data from the API.
